Title: Authorizes the imposition of penalties on subcontractors for failure to adhere to the standards for prompt, fair and equitable settlement of claims for health care and payments for health care services
Summary: Authorizes the imposition of penalties on subcontractors for failure to adhere to the standards for prompt, fair and equitable settlement of claims for health care and payments for health care services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to penalties imposed on subcontractors for failure to adhere to the standards for prompt, fair and equitable settlement of claims for health care and payments for health care services
